results.title: Carob Extract (Ceratonia siliqua L.): Effects on Dyslipidemia and Obesity in a High-Fat Diet-Fed Rat Model
results.text_hl: Moreover, groups treated with @CHEMICAL_locust_bean_gum @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017471 @@@carob@@@ also had notably lower body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ than groups treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_locust_bean_gum @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017471 @@@carob@@@ combined (p < 0.05).

results.title: The protective effects of Salvia officinalis essential oil compared to simvastatin against hyperlipidemia, liver, and kidney injuries in mice submitted to a high-fat diet.
results.text_hl: All animals were sacrificed after 8 weeks of treatment. SEO and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced in HFD @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, disruption of liver @DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@and renal@@@ functions and @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ production.

results.title: Co-administration of obeticholic acid and simvastatin protects against high-fat diet-induced non-alcoholic steatohepatitis in mice
results.text_hl: Co-administration of @CHEMICAL_obeticholic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C464660 @@@OCA@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ prevents body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ in HFD-fed mice

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ mitigated peribronchiolar @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Blister @DISEASE_MESH:D001768 @@@pulmonary bullae@@@ formed in the smoke-exposed lungs with @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ as compared to the smoking @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Jiang X, Zhang L, Wang L, Li Z, Sun W. Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD. Int J Clin Exp Pathol. 2014;7(12):8553-62. PMID: 25674219

results.title: Simvastatin prevents and reverses chronic pulmonary hypertension in newborn rats via pleiotropic inhibition of RhoA signaling.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: Preventive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment improved @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, did not lower systemic blood pressure, and did not cause apparent toxic effects on skeletal muscle, liver or brain.

citations.NLM: Wong MJ, Kantores C, Ivanovska J, Jain A, Jankov RP. Simvastatin prevents and reverses chronic pulmonary hypertension in newborn rats via pleiotropic inhibition of RhoA signaling. Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol. 2016 Nov 1;311(5):L985-L999. PMID: 27694473

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates intestinal fibrosis independent of the anti-inflammatory effect by promoting fibroblast/myofibroblast apoptosis in the regeneration/healing process from TNBS-induced colitis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: (1) The clinical findings showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIMV@@@ showed anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects with body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and improvement of @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Glandular_and_Epithelial @DISEASE_MESH:D009375 @@@epithelial injury@@@ in the late phase.

results.title: Enhanced circulating PCSK9 concentration by berberine through SREBP-2 pathway in high fat diet-fed rats
results.text_hl: Compared with HFD @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@BBR@@@ significantly reduced body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and improved @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile (P < 0.05 respectively).

citations.NLM: Jia YJ, Xu RX, Sun J, Tang Y, Li JJ. Enhanced circulating PCSK9 concentration by berberine through SREBP-2 pathway in high fat diet-fed rats J Transl Med. 2014 Apr 23;12():103. PMID: 24755036

results.title: Anti-obesity and antihyperlipidaemic effect of Hunteria umbellata seed extract in experimental hyperlipidaemia.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Oral pre-treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and graded oral doses of HU significantly (p<0.05) reduced the @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Gain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ pattern and caused dose related (p<0.05, p<0.01 and p<0.001) reductions in the serum @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@, CRI, AI and LI.

citations.NLM: Adeneye AA, Adeyemi OO, Agbaje EO. Anti-obesity and antihyperlipidaemic effect of Hunteria umbellata seed extract in experimental hyperlipidaemia. J Ethnopharmacol. 2010 Jul 20;130(2):307-14. PMID: 20471465
